description: This is a roof replacement project located in Dorchester, NB. The project involves the replacement of the roof. The contract is composed of a two-phase process: the first phase will evaluate the qualifications of all interested suppliers, and the second phase will invite the qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project. The alert is for a prior notice of contract change
tags: Roofing and siding and sheet metal services
full_summary:
# Tender Announcement
## Roof Replacement - Dorchester, NB

### Overview
This tender notice announces the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) procurement for roof replacement services at the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) facility in Dorchester, New Brunswick.

### Key Details

*   **Solicitation Number**: WS4136385670
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-08-23T14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: 2024-03-31
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: 2024-09-30

### Tender Details
The tender will be awarded based on a two-phase process. In Phase One, all interested and qualified suppliers will be evaluated based on their qualifications. The suppliers will be invited to provide a financial bid on the project in Phase Two.

### Important Dates
*   **Notice Publication Date**: 2023-08-08
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-08-23T14:00:00

### Evaluation
The selection criteria for the tender are:
*   **Prix le plus bas (Lowest Price)**

### Contracting Entity
The contracting entity for this tender is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).

### Related Documents
All inquiries of a technical nature and all questions of a contractual nature should be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority: Kate Mintzer, kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Contact Information
Contact Name: Kate Mintzer
Contact Email: kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Contact Address: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada

### Links
*   [Notice URL](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17105550?extsite=MTcxMDU1NTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
*   [Contract Document](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17105550?extsite=MTcxMDU1NTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). The regions of opportunity and delivery
